verified_true.description: Claims that should return VERIFIED TRUE (supported)
questions: Did the Titanic sink in 1912?
Was George Washington the first president of the United States?
Did World War II end in 1945?
Is the Great Wall of China a UNESCO World Heritage Site?
Did Neil Armstrong walk on the moon in 1969?
Was Albert Einstein awarded the Nobel Prize in Physics?
Did the Roman Empire fall in 476 AD?
Is Mount Everest the highest mountain on Earth?
Did Leonardo da Vinci paint the Mona Lisa?
Was the Declaration of Independence signed in 1776?

verified_false.description: Claims that should return VERIFIED FALSE (not_supported)
questions: Did Napoleon Bonaparte win the Battle of Waterloo?
Was the Great Wall of China built in the 20th century?
Did Christopher Columbus discover America in 1592?
Was Einstein the inventor of the telephone?
Did the Titanic sink on its 10th voyage?
Was Julius Caesar the first Roman Emperor?
Did humans land on Mars in 1999?
Was Shakespeare born in London?
Did World War I start in 1920?
Is the Earth flat?

uncertain.description: Claims that may return UNCERTAIN (mixed/insufficient evidence)
questions: Did Cleopatra have blue eyes?
Was King Arthur a real historical figure?
Did Vikings reach North America before Columbus?
Was the Shroud of Turin created in medieval times?
Did Atlantis actually exist?
Was Robin Hood a real person?
Did ancient Egyptians use electricity?
Was there a female Pope in the Middle Ages?

out_of_scope.description: Queries that should be routed as OUT OF SCOPE

coding_requests: Write me a Python function to sort a list
Give me a JavaScript code for a calculator
Create a SQL query to find duplicates
Write a bash script to backup files
creative_requests: Write me a poem about history
Create a story about ancient Rome
Compose a song about the Renaissance
opinion_requests: Which is better, Mac or Windows?
Should I learn Python or JavaScript?
What do you think about AI?
realtime_requests: What is the current stock price of Apple?
What's the Bitcoin price right now?

multi_claim.description: Complex queries with multiple claims to verify
questions: Napoleon was short and lost the Battle of Waterloo
Einstein invented the theory of relativity and was born in Germany
The Titanic sank in 1912 after hitting an iceberg on its maiden voyage
Columbus discovered America in 1492 and was Italian
World War II started in 1939 and ended with the atomic bombing of Japan
Was Cleopatra Egyptian?
Did Abraham Lincoln free the slaves?
Was Mozart a child prodigy?
Did Genghis Khan create the largest land empire?
Was Marie Curie the first woman to win a Nobel Prize?
Did Alexander the Great die young?
Was Queen Victoria the longest-reigning British monarch?
Did Galileo invent the telescope?

common_myths.description: Popular myths and misconceptions to debunk
questions: Did Vikings wear horned helmets?
Is the Great Wall of China visible from space?
Was Napoleon short for his time?
Did medieval people think the Earth was flat?
Did Einstein fail math in school?
Did Marie Antoinette say 'Let them eat cake'?
Were gladiator fights always to the death?
Did cowboys really have quick-draw duels?
Is it true that the pyramids were built by slaves?
Verify whether the moon landing was real
True or false: Benjamin Franklin discovered electricity
Did humans really evolve from apes?
Confirm if the French Revolution started in 1789
Is it accurate that dinosaurs and humans coexisted?

recommended_demo_flow.question: Was King Arthur a real historical figure?
Write me a Python function to sort a list
Is the Great Wall of China visible from space?
Einstein invented the theory of relativity and was born in Germany
